title: 【求助】反光的水 怎么安装！
author: qq354501774
txt_content:
我安装上面的安装 
                      安装完了 进游戏黑屏  没翻译！
                  十分郁闷！

replies.txt_content: 置顶 mod安装千篇一律

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content:
qq354501774 发表于 2011-11-13 17:49 
还是不会 ！  我不是怎么安装mod
哦。。。反光水不是mod么？？？？？？？？？？？？

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
唉, 看原帖說明吧... 
http://www.minecraftforum.net/to ... r-shader-alpha-v4d/

它與 Modloader 會有衝突, 所以作者另做了個Modloader 版本的, 請先確認你所下載版本是哪個
如果打過高清修復 Better grass fix 還要再加個補丁

請照安裝步驟進行安裝... 
Instructions:
1. copy the files from the Minecraft folder to the minecraft.jar
2. delete the '/meta_inf' folder in your minecraft.jar
3. copy the '/shader' folder to your '/bin' folder
(If there is no '/shader' folder in your '/bin' folder create one; or simply drag the whole '/shader' folder to your '/bin' folder.)

注意與其他MOD的相容性... 
Known incompatibilities for the default version:
- Modloader (there is a modloader version; to install: start from a project using modloader; then copy the water shader files)
- OptiFine
- Forge API
- Better Than Wolves
- Finite Liquids
